amendment.description: Amendments en bloc comprised of the following amendments printed in Part B of House Report 116-119 as en bloc No. 4: Nos. 126, 138, 141, 142, 152, 153, 155, 159, 160, 164, 169, 170, 171, 172, 175, 177, 178, 180, 181, 182, 192, and 193.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McCollum amendments (A045) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendments en bloc (A045) offered by Ms. McCollum.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
